name: Clamato® Seafood Stuffed Peppers
author: Clamato
summary: Liven your week with this tasty seacoast recipe of peppers stuffed with tilapia, scallops and shrimp.
ingredients: 1 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled, deveined and diced
1  tilapia fillet, cut into bite-size pieces
4  Cubanelle peppers, cut in half and hollowed out
directions: In a large saute pan on medium-high heat, heat olive oil; add onions and garlic; cook for 2 minutes
Add shrimp, tilapia and bay scallops; cook 3-4 minutes until about halfway done
Add Clamato®, lemon juice, seafood seasoning, basil and rice; mix well
Remove from heat; blend in Monterey Jack
Spoon mixture into peppers, place in a lightly greased baking dish, cover with foil and bake for 20 minutes
Remove foil and top with Cheddar; bake 5 more minutes or until the cheese is melted
